title: Project Vena Cava [game trailer]
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Video games
abstract: A science fiction themed game with dark cinematic elements. 'Screen It' 2014 Winner: Secondary Videogame.
description: 'Project Vena Cava' is an ambitious atmospheric first-person shooter with dark cinematic elements. Its storyline is science fiction themed and is delivered primarily through written documents found throughout the game, as well as a voiceover that accompanies the player throughout. It is similar in style to other sci-fi first-person shooters such as 'Halo', 'Metroid Prime' and 'Portal'.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003031; 'Screen It' 2014 [winning entries]; Active; 2014
